docs.snippet: NEW BRUNSWICK, N. J., March 28 -- Greater emphasis on the study of the Spanish language and Latin- American culture as a way of promoting hemisphere understanding and solidarity was urged today at a conference on inter-American culture and education,...
docs.lead_paragraph: NEW BRUNSWICK, N. J., March 28 -- Greater emphasis on the study of the Spanish language and Latin- American culture as a way of promoting hemisphere understanding and solidarity was urged today at a conference on inter-American culture and education, held on the campus of Rutgers University.
docs.abstract: some at NJ conf on inter-Amer culture urge US schools stress study to promote hemispheric unity

headline.main: EDUCATORS STRESS STUDY OF SPANISH; Speakers at Rutgers Meeting Say Schools Must Promote Inter-American Unity

docs.snippet: American wool buyers are gravely concerned with the balance of payments crisis in Australia, it was learned last week. The crisis injects another note of uncertainty into the market at a time when wool manufacturers here already are up to their necks...
docs.lead_paragraph: American wool buyers are gravely concerned with the balance of payments crisis in Australia, it was learned last week. The crisis injects another note of uncertainty into the market at a time when wool manufacturers here already are up to their necks in a morass of slow moving goods and labor difficulties.

headline.main: Wool Buyers Here Are Concerned On Australian Payments Balance; AUSTRALIA ALARMS WOOL BUYERS HERE

docs.lead_paragraph: The Canadian dollar sold at a premium of 1 1/15 cent last Friday, highest since mid-December, 1934; the close was 1 cent, an advance of 7/8 cent over the preceding week and the broadest gain since Canadian touched parity with United States dollar last month.

docs.snippet: Thor Thors, Minister Pleipotentiary to the United States from Iceland for the last eleven years, is about to become what is probably the only triple-envoy in the Western world. A versatile man with an amazing amount of energy, he sailed last night...
docs.lead_paragraph: Thor Thors, Minister Pleipotentiary to the United States from Iceland for the last eleven years, is about to become what is probably the only triple-envoy in the Western world. A versatile man with an amazing amount of energy, he sailed last night aboard tthe Moore-McCormack liner Uruguay to present his credentials to the Brazilian and Argentine Governments.
docs.abstract: Min Thors named 1st envoy to Brazil and Argentina, is only triple-envoy in Western world
